mapper.select: SELECT t.*, t2.user_name, t.vacation_id AS orderNo, t3.process_id, t4.dict_name type_name FROM t_vacation_order t LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN t_flow_audit t3 ON t3.order_no = t.vacation_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict t4 ON t4.dict_value = t.vacation_type WHERE t2.user_id = #{userId} AND t.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
